examples.example: 我相信只要坚持努力，在一万个小时后一定能取得巨大的成功。

translate.english: I believe that as long as we keep working hard, we will surely achieve great success after ten thousand hours.

examples.example: 在未来的一万天里，我要努力让自己的生活变得更加精彩。

translate.english: In the next ten thousand days, I will strive to make my life more wonderful.

examples.example: 我的目标是在一万个日子里，让自己成长为一个更加优秀的人。

translate.english: My goal is to make myself grow into a more excellent person in ten thousand days.
